codeTemplateLibrary.name: Library 1
codeTemplateLibrary.description:
This library was added upon migration to version 3.3.0. It includes all pre-existing code templates, and is set to be included on all pre-existing and new channels.
You should create your own new libraries and assign code templates to them as you see fit. You should also link libraries to specific channels, so that you're not necessarily including all code templates on all channels all the time.
